title: Colombo beats Jaffna at Snr Basketball Champs
content: The Colombo Basketball team defeated the Jaffna Basketball team at the 53rd Senior National Basketball Championship on Monday (14).The 53rd Senior National Basketball Championship held at the Sugathadasa Indoor Stadium.The Championships are taking place in the Men’s and Women’s categories and each category is divided into two groups, A & B.Four men’s matches were played on Monday (14) while Jaffna and Colombo played in group B, and Colombo won the match 96-75.
